src:
「たまたま見つけた」女性の首を絞め、太ももかむ…男逮捕

03 Nov 2019, 05:11

　警視庁四谷署は２日、新潟県阿賀野市、会社員の男（３０）を強制わいせつ致傷容疑で逮捕した。
　発表によると、男は８月１７日午後６時頃、東京都新宿区の路上で、１０歳代女性の首を背後から絞め付けて失神させたうえ、倒れた女性の太ももをかみ、全治１週間のけがを負わせた疑い。「たまたま見つけた女性に性欲を抑えられなかった」と容疑を認めている。
　事件当時、男は都内に住んでおり、防犯カメラの映像から特定された。
text:
"I happened to find it" strangled a woman's neck and biting her thigh ... Man arrested

03 Nov 2019, 05:11

The Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department Yotsuya station arrested a man (30) in Agano City, Niigata Prefecture on March 2 for alleged sexual injuries.
According to the announcement, at around 6 pm on August 17th, a man squeezed the neck of a 10-year-old woman from behind, biting the thigh of a fallen woman, and Zenji 1 Suspected of being injured for a week. "The woman who happened to find it couldn't suppress her libido," she admits.
At the time of the incident, the man lived in Tokyo and was identified from the video of the security camera.
